sources.title: Tread Softly
sources.description: Title: Tread Softly Summary: The star of a London musical walks out before the curtain up, but the show must go on in a haunted theatre, The Regency. 40 years previously, the star of Hamlet was murdered, and more are dying to keep a dark secret. Directed by: David MacDonald Actors: John Bentley, Patricia Dainton, John Laurie Production Company: Albany Release Date: December 1952 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 The star of a London musical walks out before the curtain up, but the show must go on in a haunted theatre, The Regency. 40 years previously, the star of Hamlet was murdered, and more are dying to keep a dark secret.

metadata.Plot: The star of a London musical walks out before the curtain up, but the show must go on in a haunted theatre, The Regency. 40 years previously, the star of Hamlet was murdered, and more are dying to keep a dark secret.
